tool.name: OGS: editMaterialID
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'editMaterialID'.
tool.command: if [ "$mesh_input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh_input_file' '${$mesh_input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; editMaterialID $replace $condense $specify --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' #if str($current_material_id).strip() != 'None' and str($current_material_id).strip() != '': --current-material-id '$current_material_id' #end if #if str($new_material_id).strip() != 'None' and str($new_material_id).strip() != '': --new-material-id '$new_material_id' #end if --element-type '$element_type' --mesh-output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: specify
param.label: specify
param.help: specify material IDs by element types (-e)

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu | .msh). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: current_material_id
param.label: current material id
param.help: current material id to be replaced

tool.help: This tool runs the **editMaterialID** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
